resources.string: AntiCrime is an android application designed to help users avoid street crimes such as theft and others. This application provides several features to help users secure themselves and report incidents of crime that occur around them.

Following are some of the features available in AntiCrime: Crime Map: This feature allows the user to see which areas have frequent crime. This map can help users to avoid these areas and choose a safer route. Crime Report: Users can report crime incidents happening around them. This report will be entered into the database and will help the police to catch the perpetrators of crime. Alert System: AppCrime has an alert system that will notify users about crime occurrences in their area. This feature will help users to be more alert while in the area.
